dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on joint status sampling and updating to minimize the age of information in IoT systems.

dcterms:description: This dataset addresses the AoI-optimal joint sampling and updating for wireless powered communication systems.

J. L. Rebelatto

dcterms:description: This dataset examines the age of information in SIC-aided massive IoT networks with random access.

dcterms:description: This dataset involves beamforming optimization and power allocation for user-centric MIMO-NOMA IoT networks.
